acceptance_criteria: All action buttons work, show loading states, update tick state, errors show toast notification
closed_reason: Added action buttons (Approve, Reject, Close, Reopen) to tick-detail-drawer component. Buttons conditionally render based on tick state: Approve/Reject for awaiting ticks, Close for open ticks without requires gate, Reopen for closed ticks. Reject/Close show textarea for reason input. Loading states disable buttons during API calls. Error messages display in sl-alert. Component emits tick-updated event with BoardTick on success. State resets on drawer close or tick change.
description:
Add action buttons to tick-detail-drawer for tick state changes:

Action buttons (sl-button with appropriate variants):
- Approve: For ticks awaiting approval (calls approve endpoint)
- Reject: For ticks awaiting approval (shows reason input, calls reject endpoint)
- Close: For open ticks (shows reason input, calls closeTick API)
- Reopen: For closed ticks (calls reopen endpoint)

Implementation:
1. Show only relevant actions based on tick state
2. Reject/Close buttons show sl-input for reason before confirming
3. Call appropriate API endpoints
4. Emit 'tick-updated' event with updated tick
5. Show loading state during API calls
6. Show error toast on failure

Test: Click each action, verify API called, tick updates in UI
title: Add tick action buttons to detail drawer
